name: SSH Multiplexer for Xfce4 Terminal
description: Launch SSH sessions in multiple tabs on xfce4-terminal

preferences.name: SSH Multiplex
preferences.description: Launch SSH sessions in multiple tabs.

preferences.name: Terminal Command
preferences.description: The command used to launch the terminal

preferences.name: Tab Option
preferences.description: The option used to open a new tab.

preferences.name: Max SSH Tabs
preferences.description: Limits the maximum number of SSH connections (tabs) that can be opened at once.

preferences.name: Command Option
preferences.description: The option used to specify the command

preferences.name: SSH Command Template (password)
preferences.default_value: bash -c 'export SSHPASS={password}; sshpass -e ssh {host}; exec bash'
preferences.description: Template for the SSH command to be used when entering a password manually.

preferences.name: SSH Command Template (no password)
preferences.description: Template for the SSH command to be used when authentication is done using an identity file.

preferences.name: Language
preferences.description: The language for the extension. If not specified, the system's default locale will be used. Available languages: de, en, es, fr, it, pt, ru, zh.
